content: I think I can fit in 5-6 hours of study per week, and I'm most productive in the morning. I work full-time, so I'd like to allocate 3-4 months to complete the program. I'd prefer to study on weekends, so I can dedicate two mornings to studying. I also want to make sure I have some buffer time in case I need it. How can I create a study plan around this?
